verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁלַ֖ח <WH7971> vai-yish-Lach sent הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech; And the king וַיַּאַסְפ֣וּ <WH622> vai-ya-'as-Fu and they gathered אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, to him כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all זִקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> zik-Nei unto him all the elders יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah וִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> vi-ru-sha-Lim. and of Jerusalem

וַיַּ֣עַל <WH5927> vai-Ya-'al went up הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech And the king בֵּית־ <WH1004> beit- into the house יְהוָ֡ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish and all the men יְהוּדָה֩ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all יֹשְׁבֵ֨י <WH3427> yo-she-Vei and all the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim of Jerusalem אִתּ֗וֹ <WH854> it-To, for וְהַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> ve-hak-ko-ha-Nim with him and the priests וְהַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <WH5030> ve-han-ne-vi-'Im, and the prophets וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am and all the people לְמִקָּטֹ֣ן <WH6996> le-mik-ka-Ton both small וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- against גָּד֑וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol; and great וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra and he read בְאָזְנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH241> ve-'a-ze-nei-Hem, in their ears אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all דִּבְרֵי֙ <WH1697> div-Rei all the words סֵ֣פֶר <WH5612> Se-fer of the book הַבְּרִ֔ית <WH1285> hab-be-Rit, of the covenant הַנִּמְצָ֖א <WH4672> han-nim-Tza which was found בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> be-Veit in the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַיַּעֲמֹ֣ד <WH5975> vai-ya-'a-Mod stood הַ֠מֶּלֶךְ <WH4428> Ham-Me-lech And the king עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- by הָ֨עַמּ֜וּד <WH5982> ha-'am-Mud by a pillar וַיִּכְרֹ֥ת <WH3772> vai-yich-Rot and made אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבְּרִ֣ית׀ <WH1285> hab-be-Rit a covenant לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD לָלֶ֜כֶת <WH1980> la-Le-chet to walk אַחַ֤ר <WH310> 'a-Char after יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD וְלִשְׁמֹ֨ר <WH8104> ve-lish-Mor and to keep מִצְוֹתָ֜יו <WH4687> mitz-vo-Tav his commandments וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et עֵדְוֹתָ֤יו <WH5715> 'e-de-vo-Tav and his testimonies וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et חֻקֹּתָיו֙ <WH2708> chuk-ko-Tav and his statutes בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all לֵ֣ב <WH3820> lev with all [their] heart וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> u-ve-Chol and all נֶ֔פֶשׁ <WH5315> Ne-fesh, and all [their] soul לְהָקִ֗ים <WH6965> le-ha-Kim, to perform אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דִּבְרֵי֙ <WH1697> div-Rei the words הַבְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> hab-be-Rit of this covenant הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> haz-Zot, that הַכְּתֻבִ֖ים <WH3789> hak-ke-tu-Vim that were written עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and הַסֵּ֣פֶר <WH5612> has-Se-fer in this book הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh; of this וַיַּעֲמֹ֥ד <WH5975> vai-ya-'a-Mod stood כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am And all the people בַּבְּרִֽית׃ <WH1285> bab-be-Rit. to the covenant

וַיְצַ֣ו <WH6680> vay-Tzav commanded הַמֶּ֡לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech And the king אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חִלְקִיָּהוּ֩ <WH2518> chil-ki-ya-Hu Hilkiah הַכֹּהֵ֨ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen priest הַגָּד֜וֹל <WH1419> hag-ga-Dol the high וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כֹּהֲנֵ֣י <WH3548> ko-ha-Nei and the priests הַמִּשְׁנֶה֮ <WH4932> ham-mish-Neh of the second order וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et שֹׁמְרֵ֣י <WH8104> sho-me-Rei and the keepers הַסַּף֒ <WH5592> has-Saf of the door לְהוֹצִיא֙ <WH3318> le-ho-Tzi to bring forth מֵהֵיכַ֣ל <WH1964> me-hei-Chal out of the temple יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD אֵ֣ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַכֵּלִ֗ים <WH3627> hak-ke-Lim, all the vessels הָֽעֲשׂוּיִם֙ <WH6213> ha-'a-su-Yim that were made לַבַּ֣עַל <WH1168> lab-Ba-'al for Baal וְלָֽאֲשֵׁרָ֔ה <WH842> ve-la-'a-she-Rah, and for the grove וּלְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> u-le-Chol and for all צְבָ֣א <WH6635> tze-Va and for all the host הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim; of heaven וַֽיִּשְׂרְפֵ֞ם <WH8313> vai-yis-re-Fem and he burned מִח֤וּץ <WH2351> mi-Chutz them without לִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> li-ru-sha-Lim Jerusalem בְּשַׁדְמ֣וֹת <WH7709> be-shad-Mot in the fields קִדְר֔וֹן <WH6939> kid-Ron, of Kidron וְנָשָׂ֥א <WH5375> ve-na-Sa and carried אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֲפָרָ֖ם <WH6083> 'a-fa-Ram the ashes בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵֽל׃ <WH1008> 'El. of them unto Bethel

וְהִשְׁבִּ֣ית <WH7673> ve-hish-Bit And he put down אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַכְּמָרִ֗ים <WH3649> hak-ke-ma-Rim, the idolatrous priests אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom נָֽתְנוּ֙ <WH5414> na-te-Nu had ordained מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> mal-Chei whom the kings יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וַיְקַטֵּ֤ר <WH6999> vay-kat-Ter to burn incense בַּבָּמוֹת֙ <WH1116> bab-ba-mOt in the high places בְּעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> be-'a-Rei in the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וּמְסִבֵּ֖י <WH4524> u-me-sib-Bei and in the places round about יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim; Jerusalem וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַֽמְקַטְּרִ֣ים <WH6999> ham-kat-te-Rim them also that burned incense לַבַּ֗עַל <WH1168> lab-Ba-'al, unto Baal לַשֶּׁ֤מֶשׁ <WH8121> lash-She-mesh to the sun וְלַיָּרֵ֙חַ֙ <WH3394> ve-lai-ya-Re-ach and to the moon וְלַמַּזָּל֔וֹת <WH4208> ve-lam-maz-za-Lot, and to the planets וּלְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> u-le-Chol all צְבָ֥א <WH6635> tze-Va and to all the host הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim. of heaven

וַיֹּצֵ֣א <WH3318> vai-yo-Tze And he brought out אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאֲשֵׁרָה֩ <WH842> ha-'a-she-Rah the grove מִבֵּ֨ית <WH1004> mib-Beit from the house יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD מִח֤וּץ <WH2351> mi-Chutz without לִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> li-ru-sha-Lim Jerusalem אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to נַ֣חַל <WH5158> Na-chal unto the brook קִדְר֔וֹן <WH6939> kid-Ron, Kidron וַיִּשְׂרֹ֥ף <WH8313> vai-yis-Rof and burned אֹתָ֛הּ <WH853> 'o-Tah בְּנַ֥חַל <WH5158> be-Na-chal it at the brook קִדְר֖וֹן <WH6939> kid-Ron Kidron וַיָּ֣דֶק <WH1854> vai-Ya-dek and stamped [it] small לְעָפָ֑ר <WH6083> le-'a-Far; to powder וַיַּשְׁלֵךְ֙ <WH7993> vai-yash-leCh and cast אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֲפָרָ֔הּ <WH6083> 'a-fa-Rah, the powder עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on קֶ֖בֶר <WH6913> Ke-ver thereof upon the graves בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> ha-'Am. of the people

וַיִּתֹּץ֙ <WH5422> vai-yit-Totz And he brake down אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בָּתֵּ֣י <WH1004> bat-Tei the houses הַקְּדֵשִׁ֔ים <WH6945> hak-ke-de-Shim, of the sodomites אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> be-Veit that [were] by the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הַנָּשִׁ֗ים <WH802> han-na-Shim, where the women אֹרְג֥וֹת <WH707> o-re-goyt wove שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> sham in it בָּתִּ֖ים <WH1004> bat-Tim hangings לָאֲשֵׁרָֽה׃ <WH842> la-'a-she-Rah. for the grove

וַיָּבֵ֤א <WH935> vai-ya-Ve And he brought אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim all the priests מֵעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> me-'a-Rei out of the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וַיְטַמֵּ֣א <WH2930> vay-tam-Me and defiled אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבָּמ֗וֹת <WH1116> hab-ba-Mot, the high places אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which קִטְּרוּ־ <WH6999> kit-te-ru- had burned incense שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <WH8033> Sham-mah in it הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> hak-Ko-ha-Nim, where the priests מִגֶּ֖בַע <WH1387> mig-Ge-va' from Geba עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against בְּאֵ֣ר be-'Er שָׁ֑בַע <WH884> Sha-va'; to Beersheba וְנָתַ֞ץ <WH5422> ve-na-Tatz and brake down אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בָּמ֣וֹת <WH1116> ba-Mot the high places הַשְּׁעָרִ֗ים <WH8179> hash-she-'a-Rim, of the gates אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which פֶּ֜תַח <WH6607> Pe-tach that [were] in the entering in שַׁ֤עַר <WH8179> Sha-'ar of the gate יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' of Joshua שַׂר־ <WH8269> sar- the governor הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir, of the city אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and שְׂמֹ֥אול <WH8040> se-Mol left hand אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> 'ish which [were] on a man's בְּשַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> be-Sha-'ar at the gate הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> ha-'Ir. of the city

אַ֗ךְ <WH389> 'Ach, Nevertheless לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo did not יַֽעֲלוּ֙ <WH5927> ya-'a-Lu came not up כֹּהֲנֵ֣י <WH3548> ko-ha-Nei Nevertheless the priests הַבָּמ֔וֹת <WH1116> hab-ba-Mot, of the high places אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מִזְבַּ֥ח <WH4196> miz-Bach to the altar יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> bi-ru-sha-Lim; in Jerusalem כִּ֛י <WH3588> ki for אִם־ <WH518> 'im- but אָכְל֥וּ <WH398> 'a-che-Lu but they did eat מַצּ֖וֹת <WH4682> matz-Tzot of the unleavened bread בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch among אֲחֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH251> 'a-chei-Hem. their brethren

וְטִמֵּ֣א <WH2930> ve-tim-Me And he defiled אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַתֹּ֔פֶת <WH8612> hat-To-fet, Topheth אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בְּגֵ֣י <WH1516> be-Gei which [is] in the valley; בְנֵי־ ve-nei- כבֶן־ <WH1121> ven- of the son הִנֹּ֑ם <WH2011> hin-Nom; of Hinnom קלְבִלְתִּ֗י <WH1115> le-vil-Ti, no לְהַעֲבִ֨יר <WH5674> le-ha-'a-Vir to pass through אִ֜ישׁ <WH376> 'ish that no man אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּנ֧וֹ <WH1121> be-No might make his son וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בִּתּ֛וֹ <WH1323> bit-To or his daughter בָּאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> ba-'Esh the fire לַמֹּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4432> lam-Mo-lech. to Molech

וַיַּשְׁבֵּ֣ת <WH7673> vai-yash-Bet And he took away אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַסּוּסִ֗ים <WH5483> has-su-Sim, the horses אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נָתְנוּ֩ <WH5414> na-te-Nu had given מַלְכֵ֨י <WH4428> mal-Chei that the kings יְהוּדָ֤ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah לַשֶּׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <WH8121> lash-She-mesh to the sun מִבֹּ֣א <WH935> mib-Bo at the entering in בֵית־ <WH1004> veit- of the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- by לִשְׁכַּת֙ <WH3957> lish-Kat by the chamber נְתַן־ ne-tan- מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH5419> Me-lech of Nathanmelech הַסָּרִ֔יס <WH5631> has-sa-Ris, the chamberlain אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בַּפַּרְוָרִ֑ים <WH6503> bap-par-va-Rim; which [was] in the suburbs וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מַרְכְּב֥וֹת <WH4818> mar-ke-Vot the chariots הַשֶּׁ֖מֶשׁ <WH8121> hash-She-mesh of the sun שָׂרַ֥ף <WH8313> sa-Raf and burned בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> ba-'Esh. with fire

וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַֽמִּזְבְּח֡וֹת <WH4196> ham-miz-be-Chot And the altars אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַגָּג֩ <WH1406> hag-Gag that [were] on the top עֲלִיַּ֨ת <WH5944> 'a-li-Yat of the upper chamber אָחָ֜ז <WH271> 'a-Chaz of Ahaz אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which עָשׂ֣וּ׀ <WH6213> 'a-Su had made מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> mal-Chei which the kings יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַֽמִּזְבְּחוֹת֙ <WH4196> ham-miz-be-chOt and the altars אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah had made מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh, which Manasseh בִּשְׁתֵּ֛י <WH8147> bish-Tei in the two חַצְר֥וֹת <WH2691> chatz-Rot courts בֵּית־ <WH1004> beit- of the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD נָתַ֣ץ <WH5422> na-Tatz beat down הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech; did the king וַיָּ֣רָץ <WH7323> vai-Ya-rotz and brake [them] down מִשָּׁ֔ם <WH8033> mish-Sham, there וְהִשְׁלִ֥יךְ <WH7993> ve-hish-Lich from thence and cast אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֲפָרָ֖ם <WH6083> 'a-fa-Ram the dust אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into נַ֥חַל <WH5158> Na-chal of them into the brook קִדְרֽוֹן׃ <WH6939> kid-Ron.
